> = ({
  formData,
  showPassword,
  disabled,
  onSubmit,
  onFormChange,
  onTogglePassword,
}) => (
  <Box component="form" onSubmit={onSubmit}>
    <FormHeader />
    
    <TextField
      fullWidth
      label=""
      variant="outlined"
      margin="normal"
      value={formData.username}
      disabled={disabled}
      onChange={(e) => onFormChange({ username: e.target.value })}
    />

    <PasswordField
